Abstract: Cost of college education is expected to outpace inflation well into the new century and perhaps forever; graph (M)
Snippet: Cost of college education is expected to outpace inflation well into the new century and perhaps forever; graph (M)
LeadParagraph: WHEN Mozart was alive, it took two to three months for a craftsman to make a watch and about 18 minutes for an ensemble to perform ''Eine Kleine Nachtmusik.'' Today, it takes two minutes for a machine to make a watch. But a performance of Mozart's familiar composition still takes musicians more than a quarter-hour.

Headline.Main: The Human Touch Will Only Inflate College Bills
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: CITIES; The Human Touch Will Only Inflate College Bills
